info.title: VirtualWANAsAServiceManagementClient
info.description: REST API for Azure VirtualWAN As a Service.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a VirtualWAN.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualWan.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being retrieved.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VirtualWAN retrieved.

put.description: Creates a VirtualWAN resource if it doesn't exist else updates the existing VirtualWAN.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualWan.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being created or updated.

parameters.name: WANParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update VirtualWAN.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VirtualWAN created or updated.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting VirtualWAN resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualWan.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being updated.

parameters.name: WANParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to Update VirtualWAN tags.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VirtualWAN updated.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the VirtualWAN updated.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualWan.

parameters.name: VirtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN being deleted.

200.description: Request successful. VirtualWAN deleted.

202.description: Request received successfully. VirtualWAN deletion is in progress; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

204.description: No VirtualWANs exist by the name provided.

get.description: Lists all the VirtualWANs in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualWan.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VirtualWANs in the resource group.

get.description: Lists all the VirtualWANs in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VirtualWANs in the subscription.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a VPN site.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnSite.

parameters.name: vpnSiteName
parameters.description: The name of the VpnSite being retrieved.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VpnSite retrieved.

put.description: Creates a VpnSite resource if it doesn't exist else updates the existing VpnSite.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnSite.

parameters.name: vpnSiteName
parameters.description: The name of the VpnSite being created or updated.

parameters.name: VpnSiteParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update VpnSite.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VpnSite created or updated.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the VpnSite created or updated.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnSite.

parameters.name: vpnSiteName
parameters.description: The name of the VpnSite being updated.

parameters.name: VpnSiteParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update VpnSite tags.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VpnSite updated.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the VpnSite updated.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnSite.

parameters.name: vpnSiteName
parameters.description: The name of the VpnSite being deleted.

200.description: Request successful. VpnSite deleted.

202.description: Request received successfully. VpnSite deletion is in progress

204.description: No VpnSites exist by the name provided.

get.description: Lists all the vpnSites in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnSite.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the vpnSites in the resource group.

get.description: Lists all the VpnSites in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VpnSites in the subscription.

post.description: Gives the sas-url to download the configurations for vpn-sites in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name.

parameters.name: virtualWANName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualWAN for which configuration of all vpn-sites is needed.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to download vpn-sites configuration.

200.description: Request successful. Follow the location header for sas-url to output blob.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously. Follow the location header for sas-url to output blob.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a VirtualHub.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualHub.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VirtualHub retrieved.

put.description: Creates a VirtualHub resource if it doesn't exist else updates the existing VirtualHub.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or update VirtualHub.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VirtualHub created or updated.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the VirtualHub created or updated.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update VirtualHub tags.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the VirtualHub updated.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the VirtualHub updated.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualHub.

200.description: Request successful. VirtualHub deleted.

202.description: Request received successfully. VirtualHub deletion is in progress; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

204.description: No VirtualHubs exist by the name provided.

get.description: Lists all the VirtualHubs in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualHub.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VirtualHubs in the resource group.

get.description: Lists all the VirtualHubs in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VirtualHubs in the subscription.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a HubVirtualNetworkConnection.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: The name of the vpn connection.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the HubVirtualNetworkConnection retrieved.

get.description: Retrieves the details of all HubVirtualNetworkConnections.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VirtualHub.

parameters.name: virtualHubName
parameters.description: The name of the VirtualHub.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the HubVirtualNetworkConnections for the VirtualHub.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a virtual wan vpn gateway.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the virtual wan vpn gateway retrieved.

put.description: Creates a virtual wan vpn gateway if it doesn't exist else updates the existing gateway.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: vpnGatewayParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or Update a virtual wan vpn gateway.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the virtual wan vpn Gateway created or updated.

201.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the virtual wan vpn gateway retrieved.

patch.description: Updates virtual wan vpn gateway tags.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: vpnGatewayParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update a virtual wan vpn gateway tags.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the updated gateway.

201.description: Request received successfully. Returns the details of the updated gateway.

delete.description: Deletes a virtual wan vpn gateway.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

200.description: Request successful. Vpn Gateway deleted.

202.description: Request received successfully. Vpn Gateway deletion is in progress; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

204.description: No vpn gateways exist by the name provided.

get.description: Lists all the VpnGateways in a resource group.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VpnGateways in the resource group.

get.description: Lists all the VpnGateways in a subscription.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of all the VpnGateways in the subscription.

get.description: Retrieves the details of a vpn connection.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: The name of the vpn connection.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the vpn connection.

put.description: Creates a vpn connection to a scalable vpn gateway if it doesn't exist else updates the existing connection.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: The name of the connection.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionParameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create or Update a VPN Connection.

200.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the vpn connection created or updated.

201.description: Request successful. Returns the details of the vpn connection created or updated.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

parameters.name: connectionName
parameters.description: The name of the connection.

200.description: Request successful. Vpn Connection deleted.

202.description: Request received successfully. Vpn Connection deletion is in progress; follow the Location header to poll for final outcome.

204.description: No vpn connections exist by the name provided.

get.description: Retrieves all vpn connections for a particular virtual wan vpn gateway.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

parameters.name: gatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the gateway.

200.description: Request successful. Returns all Vpn connections for a virtual wan vpn gateway.

disableVpnEncryption.description: Vpn encryption to be disabled or not.

virtualHubs.description: List of VirtualHubs in the VirtualWAN.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ListVirtualWANsResult.description: Result of the request to list VirtualWANs. It contains a list of VirtualWANs and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

virtualWAN.description: The VirtualWAN to which the vpnSite belongs

siteKey.description: The key for vpn-site that can be used for connections.

addressSpace.description: The AddressSpace that contains an array of IP address ranges.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ListVpnSitesResult.description: Result of the request to list VpnSites. It contains a list of VpnSites and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

vpnSites.description: List of resource-ids of the vpn-sites for which config is to be downloaded.

outputBlobSasUrl.description: The sas-url to download the configurations for vpn-sites

virtualWan.description: The VirtualWAN to which the VirtualHub belongs

hubVirtualNetworkConnections.description: list of all vnet connections with this VirtualHub.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ListVirtualHubsResult.description: Result of the request to list VirtualHubs. It contains a list of VirtualHubs and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

virtualHub.description: The VirtualHub to which the gateway belongs

connections.description: list of all vpn connections to the gateway.

bgpSettings.description: Local network gateway's BGP speaker settings.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

policies.description: The policies applied to this vpn gateway.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ListVpnGatewaysResult.description: Result of the request to list VpnGateways. It contains a list of VpnGateways and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

remoteVpnSite.description: Id of the connected vpn site.

ipsecPolicies.description: The IPSec Policies to be considered by this connection.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ListVpnConnectionsResult.description: Result of the request to list all vpn connections to a virtual wan vpn gateway. It contains a list of Vpn Connections and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

remoteVirtualNetwork.description: Reference to the remote virtual network.

allowHubToRemoteVnetTransit.description: VirtualHub to RemoteVnet transit to enabled or not.

allowRemoteVnetToUseHubVnetGateways.description: Allow RemoteVnet to use Virtual Hub's gateways.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ListHubVirtualNetworkConnectionsResult.description: List of HubVirtualNetworkConnections and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

vpnSite.description: The resource-uri of the vpn-site for which config is to be fetched.

DeviceProperties.description: List of properties of the device.

allowBranchToBranchTraffic.description: True if branch to branch traffic is allowed.

allowVnetToVnetTraffic.description: True if Vnet to Vnet traffic is allowed.

VpnConnectionStatus.description: The current state of the vpn connection.

TunnelConnectionStatus.description: The current state of the tunnel.

HubVirtualNetworkConnectionStatus.description: The current state of the VirtualHub to vnet connection.

disableVpnEncryption.description: Vpn encryption to be disabled or not.

access.description: Access to be allowed or denied.
